# [Interview #653: LOC Signing Report - Keith Casner, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=653#2)

#### Keith Casner

On my turn, I asked him if he listened to music while he wrote.

#### Robert Jordan

He said yes, classical.
